traits.appointment_among_seven: Chosen as one of the seven reputable men full of the Spirit and wisdom appointed to oversee the daily distribution to widows in Jerusalem.
traits.mission_in_samaria: After persecution in Jerusalem, preaches Christ in a city of Samaria, performs signs, and leads many to faith and baptism, including attention from Simon the magician.
traits.encounter_with_ethiopian: Led by an angel and the Spirit to meet an Ethiopian court official on the road, explains Isaiah, proclaims Jesus, and baptizes him before being carried away by the Spirit.
traits.continued_evangelistic_activity: Appears traveling through towns proclaiming the good news until he comes to Caesarea.
traits.host_in_caesarea: Later found in Caesarea, called 'the evangelist,' hosting Paul and his companions; has four unmarried daughters who prophesy.
traits.narrative_profile: Embodies Spirit-led outreach beyond Jerusalem, bridging Jerusalem, Samaria, and the wider Gentile world through word and sacrament.
